metadata.title: The North Sea and Northeastern Bering Sea: A Comparative Study of the Occurrence and Geometry of Sand Bodies of Two Shallow Epicontinental Shelves

creators.name: Swie-Djin Nio of the Comparative Sedimentology Division, University of Utrecht, The Netherlands

metadata.description: A report on the North Sea and Northeastern Bering Sea: A comparative study of the occurrence and geometry of sand bodies of two shallow epicontinental shelves.
